about:
Hi! My name is Kostadin Plachkov. I'm a software engineer building high performance and availability systems, and focusing on impact and delivering innovative products. I specialize in cloud computing, distributed systems and information security. Currently, I'm working at SAP - BTP Core Platform Security Engineering.

I'm also a cloud native and OSS ambassador, and contributor to Docker, Netflix, Signal, HAPCI and other projects and organizations. I believe in continued education and research, that's why I have also contributed to the advancements in education for the fields of computer science in accredited educational institutions.
